DOC.brief_summary: The study protocol aim test hypothesis lifestyle intervention program aim increase leisure-time physical activity reduce body weight improve parameter metabolic syndrome quality life among obese , non-diabetic Arab woman
DOC.detailed_description: 200 obese non-diabetic Arab woman , 35-54 year old , one parameter metabolic syndrome ( NCEP-III criterion ) randomize either conventional intensive treatment . The intensive intervention arm include group meeting physical education instructor ( twice month ) , group meeting dietician ( per month ) personal dietary counselling ( per month ) . The target achieve least 7 % reduction initial body weight engagement leisure-time sport activity least 150 min/week.Evaluation enrollment end trial include : information dietary physical activity habit , quality life parameter , anthropometric blood pressure measurement , blood lipid profile , fast post oral glucose load blood glucose insulin level . Duration intervention : 12 month .
DOC.criteria: Obesity ( BMI : 3040 kg/squared meter ) Female Gender Being 3554 year old Diabetic A contraindication physical activity
